title: Data Backup and Restore Requirement
description: Ensure that the system has regular data backups and a tested restore process.

description.const: The system must perform regular backups and have a verified process for data restoration.

scope-text.const: Critical systems where data integrity is essential.

backup-frequency.description: How often backups should be performed.

restore-test-frequency.description: How often the restore process should be tested.

responsible-team.description: The team responsible for ensuring data backups and restore processes are conducted.

evidence-type.description: Type of evidence required to demonstrate compliance.
